79 {
80 #ifdef ELUNA
81  delete elunaEvents;
82  elunaEvents = nullptr;
83 #endif
84 
85  // this may happen because there are many !create/delete
86  if (IsWorldObject() && m_currMap)
87  {
88  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_CORPSE)
89  {
90  LOG_FATAL("entities.object", "Object::~Object Corpse %s, type=%d deleted but still in map!!", GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), ((Corpse*)this)->GetType());

92  }

94  }

1255 {
1256  float sizefactor = useBoundingRadius ? GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize() : 0.0f;
1257  float maxdist = dist2compare + sizefactor;
1258 
1259  if (m_transport && obj->GetTransport() && obj->GetTransport()->GetGUID() == m_transport->GetGUID())
1260  {
1261  float dtx = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionX - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionX;
1262  float dty = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionY - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionY;
1263  float disttsq = dtx * dtx + dty * dty;
1264  if (is3D)
1265  {
1266  float dtz = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionZ - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionZ;
1267  disttsq += dtz * dtz;
1268  }
1269  return disttsq < (maxdist * maxdist);
1270  }
1271

1273  float dy = GetPositionY() - obj->GetPositionY();
1274  float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1275  if (is3D)
1276  {
1277  float dz = GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ();
1278  distsq += dz * dz;
1279  }
1280 
1281  return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1282 }

◆ CanDetectInvisibilityOf()

bool WorldObject::CanDetectInvisibilityOf ( WorldObject const *  obj) const
private

Definition at line 2042 of file Object.cpp.

2043 {
2044  uint32 mask = obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() & m_invisibilityDetect.GetFlags();
2045  // xinef: include invisible flags of caster in the mask, 2 invisible objects should be able to detect eachother
2046  mask |= obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() & m_invisibility.GetFlags();
2047 
2048  // Check for not detected types
2049  if (mask != obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags())
2050  return false;
2051 
2052  // It isn't possible in invisibility to detect something that can't detect the invisible object
2053  // (it's at least true for spell: 66)
2054  // It seems like that only Units are affected by this check (couldn't see arena doors with preparation invisibility)
2055  if (obj->ToUnit())
2056  {
2057  uint32 objMask = m_invisibility.GetFlags() & obj->m_invisibilityDetect.GetFlags();
2058  // xinef: include invisible flags of caster in the mask, 2 invisible objects should be able to detect eachother
2059  objMask |= m_invisibility.GetFlags() & obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags();
2060  if (objMask != m_invisibility.GetFlags())
2061  return false;
2062  }
2063 
2064  for (uint32 i = 0; i < TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES; ++i)
2065  {
2066  if (!(mask & (1 << i)))
2067  continue;
2068 
2069  // xinef: visible for the same invisibility type:
2070  if (m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i)) && obj->m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i)))
2071  continue;
2072 
2073  int32 objInvisibilityValue = obj->m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i));
2074  int32 ownInvisibilityDetectValue = m_invisibilityDetect.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i));
2075 
2076  // Too low value to detect
2077  if (ownInvisibilityDetectValue < objInvisibilityValue)
2078  return false;
2079  }
2080 
2081  return true;
2082 }

◆ CanDetectStealthOf()

bool WorldObject::CanDetectStealthOf ( WorldObject const *  obj,
bool  checkAlert = false 
) const
private

Definition at line 2084 of file Object.cpp.

2085 {
2086  // Combat reach is the minimal distance (both in front and behind),
2087  // and it is also used in the range calculation.
2088  // One stealth point increases the visibility range by 0.3 yard.
2089 
2090  if (!obj->m_stealth.GetFlags())
2091  return true;
2092 
2093  // dead players shouldnt be able to detect stealth on arenas
2094  if (isType(TYPEMASK_PLAYER))
2095  if (!ToPlayer()->IsAlive())
2096  return false;
2097 
2098  float distance = GetExactDist(obj);
2099  float combatReach = 0.0f;
2100 
2101  if (isType(TYPEMASK_UNIT))
2102  combatReach = ((Unit*)this)->GetCombatReach();
2103 
2104  if (distance < combatReach)
2105  return true;
2106 
2107  if (!HasInArc(M_PI, obj))
2108  return false;
2109 
2110  for (uint32 i = 0; i < TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES; ++i)
2111  {
2112  if (!(obj->m_stealth.GetFlags() & (1 << i)))
2113  continue;
2114 
2115  if (isType(TYPEMASK_UNIT))
2116  if (((Unit*)this)->HasAuraTypeWithMiscvalue(SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH, i))
2117  return true;
2118 
2119  // Starting points
2120  int32 detectionValue = 30;
2121 
2122  // Level difference: 5 point / level, starting from level 1.
2123  // There may be spells for this and the starting points too, but
2124  // not in the DBCs of the client.
2125  detectionValue += int32(getLevelForTarget(obj) - 1) * 5;
2126 
2127  // Apply modifiers
2128  detectionValue += m_stealthDetect.GetValue(StealthType(i));
2129  if (obj->isType(TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT))
2130  {
2131  detectionValue += 30; // pussywizard: increase detection range for gameobjects (ie. traps)
2132  if (Unit* owner = ((GameObject*)obj)->GetOwner())
2133  detectionValue -= int32(owner->getLevelForTarget(this) - 1) * 5;
2134  }
2135 
2136  detectionValue -= obj->m_stealth.GetValue(StealthType(i));
2137 
2138  // Calculate max distance
2139  float visibilityRange = float(detectionValue) * 0.3f + combatReach;
2140 
2141  Unit const* unit = ToUnit();
2142 
2143  // If this unit is an NPC then player detect range doesn't apply
2144  if (unit && unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && visibilityRange > MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE)
2145  visibilityRange = MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE;
2146 
2147  if (checkAlert)
2148  visibilityRange += (visibilityRange * 0.08f) + 1.5f;
2149 
2150  Unit const* targetUnit = obj->ToUnit();
2151 
2152  // If checking for alert, and creature's visibility range is greater than aggro distance, No alert
2153  if (checkAlert && unit && unit->ToCreature() && visibilityRange >= unit->ToCreature()->GetAttackDistance(targetUnit) + unit->ToCreature()->m_CombatDistance)
2154  return false;
2155 
2156  if (distance > visibilityRange)
2157  return false;
2158  }
2159 
2160  return true;
2161 }

◆ CanSeeOrDetect()

bool WorldObject::CanSeeOrDetect ( WorldObject const *  obj,

) const

Definition at line 1885 of file Object.cpp.

1886 {
1887  if (this == obj)
1888  return true;
1889 
1890  if (obj->IsNeverVisible() || CanNeverSee(obj))
1891  return false;
1892 
1893  if (obj->IsAlwaysVisibleFor(this) || CanAlwaysSee(obj))
1894  return true;
1895 
1896  // Creature scripts
1897  if (Creature const* cObj = obj->ToCreature())
1898  if (cObj->IsAIEnabled && this->ToPlayer() && !cObj->AI()->CanBeSeen(this->ToPlayer()))
1899  return false;
1900 
1901  // Gameobject scripts
1902  if (GameObject const* goObj = obj->ToGameObject())
1903  if (this->ToPlayer() && !goObj->AI()->CanBeSeen(this->ToPlayer()))
1904  return false;
1905 
1906  // pussywizard: arena spectator
1907  if (obj->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1908  if (((const Player*)obj)->IsSpectator() && ((const Player*)obj)->FindMap()->IsBattleArena())
1909  return false;
1910 
1911  bool corpseVisibility = false;
1912  if (distanceCheck)
1913  {
1914  bool corpseCheck = false;
1915  WorldObject const* viewpoint = this;
1916  if (Player const* thisPlayer = ToPlayer())
1917  {
1918  if (thisPlayer->isDead() && thisPlayer->GetHealth() > 0 && // Cheap way to check for ghost state
1919  !(obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST))
1920  {
1921  if (Corpse* corpse = thisPlayer->GetCorpse())
1922  {
1923  corpseCheck = true;
1924  if (corpse->IsWithinDist(thisPlayer, GetSightRange(obj), false))
1925  if (corpse->IsWithinDist(obj, GetSightRange(obj), false))
1926  corpseVisibility = true;
1927  }
1928  }
1929 
1930  // our additional checks
1931  if (Unit const* target = obj->ToUnit())
1932  {
1933  // xinef: don't allow to detect vehicle accessory if you can't see vehicle base!
1934  if (Unit const* vehicle = target->GetVehicleBase())
1935  if (!thisPlayer->HaveAtClient(vehicle))
1936  return false;
1937 
1938  // pussywizard: during arena preparation, don't allow to detect pets if can't see its owner (spoils enemy arena frames)
1939  if (target->IsPet() && target->GetOwnerGUID() && target->FindMap()->IsBattleArena() && GetGUID() != target->GetOwnerGUID())
1940  if (BattlegroundMap* bgmap = target->FindMap()->ToBattlegroundMap())
1941  if (Battleground* bg = bgmap->GetBG())
1942  if (bg->GetStatus() < STATUS_IN_PROGRESS && !thisPlayer->HaveAtClient(target->GetOwnerGUID()))
1943  return false;
1944  }
1945 
1946  if (thisPlayer->GetViewpoint())
1947  viewpoint = thisPlayer->GetViewpoint();
1948 
1949  if (thisPlayer->GetFarSightDistance() && !thisPlayer->isInFront(obj))
1950  {
1951  return false;
1952  }
1953  }
1954 
1955  // Xinef: check reversely obj vs viewpoint, object could be a gameObject which overrides _IsWithinDist function to include gameobject size
1956  if (!corpseCheck && !viewpoint->IsWithinDist(obj, GetSightRange(obj), true))
1957  return false;
1958  }
1959 
1960  // GM visibility off or hidden NPC
1961  if (!obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM))
1962  {
1963  // Stop checking other things for GMs
1964  if (m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM))
1965  return true;
1966  }
1967  else
1968  return m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM) >= obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM);
1969 
1970  // Ghost players, Spirit Healers, and some other NPCs
1971  if (!corpseVisibility && !(obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST)))
1972  {
1973  // Alive players can see dead players in some cases, but other objects can't do that
1974  if (Player const* thisPlayer = ToPlayer())
1975  {
1976  if (Player const* objPlayer = obj->ToPlayer())
1977  {
1978  if (thisPlayer->GetTeamId() != objPlayer->GetTeamId() || !thisPlayer->IsGroupVisibleFor(objPlayer))
1979  return false;
1980  }
1981  else
1982  return false;
1983  }
1984  else
1985  return false;
1986  }
1987 
1988  if (obj->IsInvisibleDueToDespawn())
1989  return false;
1990 
1991  // pussywizard: arena spectator
1992  if (this->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1993  if (((const Player*)this)->IsSpectator() && ((const Player*)this)->FindMap()->IsBattleArena() && (obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() || obj->m_stealth.GetFlags()))
1994  return false;
1995 
1996  if (!CanDetect(obj, ignoreStealth, !distanceCheck, checkAlert))
1997  return false;
1998 
1999  return true;
2000 }
STATUS_IN_PROGRESS

1708 {
1709  // have a fun with Archimedes' formula
1710  auto height = GetCollisionHeight();
1711  auto width = GetCollisionWidth();
1712  auto weight = getWeight(height, width, 1040); // avg human specific weight
1713  auto heightOutOfWater = getOutOfWater(width, weight, 10202) * 4.0f; // avg human density
1714  auto heightInWater = height - heightOutOfWater;
1715  return (height > heightInWater ? heightInWater : (height - (height / 3)));

void WorldObject::GetNearPoint ( WorldObject const *  searcher,
float &  x,
float &  y,
float &  z,

float  distance2d,
float  absAngle,
float  controlZ = 0,

) const

Definition at line 2698 of file Object.cpp.

2699 {
2700  GetNearPoint2D(x, y, distance2d + searcher_size, absAngle, startPos);
2701  z = GetPositionZ();
2702 
2703  if (searcher)
2704  {
2705  if (Unit const* unit = searcher->ToUnit(); Unit const* target = ToUnit())
2706  {
2707  if (unit && target && unit->IsInWater() && target->IsInWater())
2708  {
2709  // if the searcher is in water
2710  // we have no ground so we can
2711  // set the target height to the
2712  // z-coord to keep the searcher
2713  // at the correct height (face to face)
2714  z += GetCollisionHeight() - unit->GetCollisionHeight();
2715  }
2716  }
2717  searcher->UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2718  }
2719  else
2720  {
2721  UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2722  }
2723 
2724  // if detection disabled, return first point
2725  if (!sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_DETECT_POS_COLLISION))
2726  return;
2727 
2728  // return if the point is already in LoS
2729  if (!controlZ && IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2730  return;
2731 
2732  // remember first point
2733  float first_x = x;
2734  float first_y = y;
2735  float first_z = z;
2736 
2737  // loop in a circle to look for a point in LoS using small steps
2738  for (float angle = float(M_PI) / 8; angle < float(M_PI) * 2; angle += float(M_PI) / 8)
2739  {
2740  GetNearPoint2D(x, y, distance2d + searcher_size, absAngle + angle, startPos);
2741  z = GetPositionZ();
2742  UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2743  if (controlZ && fabsf(GetPositionZ() - z) > controlZ)
2744  continue;
2745 
2746  if (IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2747  return;
2748  }
2749 
2750  // still not in LoS, give up and return first position found
2751  if (startPos)
2752  {
2753  x = searcher->GetPositionX();
2754  y = searcher->GetPositionY();
2755  z = searcher->GetPositionZ();
2756  }
2757  else
2758  {
2759  x = first_x;
2760  y = first_y;
2761  z = first_z;
2762  }
2763 }

2665  if (searcher)
2666  {
2667  effectiveReach += searcher->GetCombatReach();
2668 
2669  if (this != searcher)
2670  {
2671  float myHover = 0.0f, searcherHover = 0.0f;
2672  if (Unit const* unit = ToUnit())
2673  myHover = unit->GetHoverHeight();
2674  if (Unit const* searchUnit = searcher->ToUnit())
2675  searcherHover = searchUnit->GetHoverHeight();
2676 
2677  float hoverDelta = myHover - searcherHover;
2678  if (hoverDelta != 0.0f)
2679  effectiveReach = std::sqrt(std::max(effectiveReach * effectiveReach - hoverDelta * hoverDelta, 0.0f));
2680  }
2681  }
2682 
2683  float positionX = startPos ? startPos->GetPositionX() : GetPositionX();
2684  float positionY = startPos ? startPos->GetPositionY() : GetPositionY();
2685 
2686  x = positionX + (effectiveReach + distance2d) * std::cos(absAngle);
2687  y = positionY + (effectiveReach + distance2d) * std::sin(absAngle);
2688 
2689  Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(x);
2690  Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(y);
2691 }

2870  // do not allow too big z changes

2874  desty -= step * sin(angle);

2882  pos.Relocate(destx, desty, destz);

1734  float ground_z = z;
1735  float max_z;
1736  if (canSwim)
1737  max_z = GetMapWaterOrGroundLevel(x, y, z, &ground_z);

1746  // water level while swimming

1748  }

1754  ground_z += hoverOffset;
1755  }
